Is this #microfrontends?

Like any architectural pattern, #microfrontends aren‚Äôt a silver bullet. If you over-apply the concept, you can over-fragment your app. There‚Äôs lots of great literature about the right size of microservices. The same concepts apply to micro frontends. Don‚Äôt over-optimize.

If your frontend codebase is large and unwieldy, you won‚Äôt be able to quickly respond to the needs of your users. By using #microfrontends on top of a #microservice architecture, you can grant control teams who can update iteratively and independently from the rest of your app.
